GameConsole.Strategy

接口 Strategy

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AggressiveStrategy, BenevolentStrategy, CheaterStrategy, HumanStrategy, OriginalStrategy, RandomStrategy

    public interface Strategy
    The classes that implement a concrete strategy should implement this. The Player class uses this to use a concrete strategy.
